thread.title: KwaTaqNuk Casino Player Wins $900,000 Jackpot on AGS® Storm Goddess™ Slot Machine
thread.title_full: KwaTaqNuk Casino Player Wins $900,000 Jackpot on AGS® Storm Goddess™ Slot Machine - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: KwaTaqNuk Casino Player Wins $900,000 Jackpot on AGS® Storm Goddess™ Slot Machine
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE AGS
LAS VEGAS , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- AGS® (the "Company"), a leading supplier of Class II and Class III gaming machines, as well as specialty table products and mobile games, announced today that a player hit a large jackpot on an AGS wide-area progressive ("WAP") game at the KwaTaqNuk Resort and Casino in Polson, Montana on September 28, 2015 . Donna Root of Breese, Illinois struck it rich with a total jackpot of $915,524.91 , which was won the Company's Storm Goddess ™ slot machine. This win marks the third time a player has been awarded the WAP jackpot at KwaTaqNuk.
"We'd like to congratulate the winner of this extraordinary WAP jackpot," said Andrew Burke , Vice President of Slot Products for AGS. "Together with KwaTaqNuk Resort and Casino, we're excited to be a part of this life-changing event for the player."
Storm Goddess , a game that is a gale force of explosive energy and design, is part of AGS' Goddess Treasures ™ multi-level progressive link, which features the WAP jackpot as the top progressive level. Goddess Treasures falls under the Company's Cadillac Cash ™ series of progressives which highlights innovative bonus features and technological advancements, creating a sensational gaming experience for the player. Since inception, Cadillac Cash has awarded over $12,000,000 in total prizes.
About AGS
AGS is a full-service designer and manufacturer of gaming products for the casino floor. The Company's roots are in the Class II Native American market, and it has recently expanded its product lines to include top performing slot games for the Class III commercial marketplace as well as specialty table game products and mobile games. Connect with the Company on its corporate website , Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , and LinkedIn .
About KwaTaqNuk Resort and Casino
KwaTaqNuk Resort and Casino is a destination resort located on the shores of the pristine Flathead Lake, under the majestic Mission Mountains, and surrounded by the beautiful wilderness of Montana . Endless entertainment is at your fingertips throughout any season whether you're here for the casino, water sports, or skiing, guests enjoy the best location and friendly Montana hospitality from the moment they arrive. Families and business travelers alike enjoy the convenience of KwaTaqNuk as our unique resort offers a wide variety of vacation and meeting options tailored to individual needs and experiences. For more information visit www.kwataqnuk.com or www.skgamingllc.com .
